name: genius loci travel
tag_list: hiking, walking, cycling, biking, kayaking, sea, self-guided-tours, small-group-adventures, cultural-walking-tours
overview:
Genius Loci Travel is a fully-licensed, independent Italian Tour Operator. The leading specialist for active holidays all over Italy.

Whether it be walking, cycling or sea-kayaking, we offer unsurpassed active adventures. From the Dolomites to Sicily, from the Amalfi Coast to Tuscany & the Cinque Terre. Our new collection of great walking tours, kayaking trips, cycling trips and hiking vacations is now available on-line, to clients worldwide.

WELCOME TO THE REAL ITALY !
